headline: PRINGLES® IS BRINGING BOLD NEW FLAVORS TO THE SNACK AISLE WITH SIX SMOKY, SALTY AND SWEET INNOVATIONS
summary: When it comes to Pringles®, flavor innovation never takes a summer vacation. The brand is continuing to deliver what its fans crave with more new, unique flavor combinations hitting shelves starting in September. From a brand-new collection of crisps with a smoky twist to launching a well-known flavor combination and introducing new sweet and savory Pringles Mingles flavors, there is truly something to satisfy every craving.

content.title: PRINGLES® IS BRINGING BOLD NEW FLAVORS TO THE SNACK AISLE WITH SIX SMOKY, SALTY AND SWEET INNOVATIONS
content.summary: When it comes to Pringles®, flavor innovation never takes a summer vacation. The brand is continuing to deliver what its fans crave with more new, unique flavor combinations hitting shelves starting in September. From a brand-new collection of crisps with a smoky twist to launching a well-known flavor combination and introducing new sweet and savory Pringles Mingles flavors, there is truly something to satisfy every craving.

thumbnail.caption: Introducing New Pringles Smoky lineup, Pringles Sharp White Cheddar, Pringles Mingles Cinnamon & Sugar and Jalapeño & Queso, plus a unique opportunity to give one flavor a first try
